title: 1939 Font - can anybody identify?
content:
I am trying to identify this font that was used in a book that was privately published at a New England school in 1939.

Any help would be appreciated!

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [poems font sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015095533/http:/typophile.com/files/poems%20font%20sample.jpg) | 8.95 KB |
author: rjhaas01

comments.content: i'm sure there are other matches or revivals that the rest of the reg's can id, but so far [Garamont Text Italic Swashes](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015095533/http:/www.fonts.com/font/p22/ltc-garamont/text-italic-swashes) fits the bill.

My goodness, but that was fast! And correct!

Thank you very much for identifying the font!
